org.drip.param.config

Class ConfigLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.param.config.ConfigLoader

  • public class ConfigLoader
extends java.lang.Object
    ConfigLoader implements the configuration functionality. It exposes the following: - Parses the XML configuration file and extract the tag pairs information. - Retrieve the logger. - Load the holiday calendars and retrieve the location holidays. - Connect to analytics server and the database server. Depending on the configuration setting, ConfigLoader loads the above from either a file or the specified database.
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
